attributes.action: Introduce restrictions on Young men who consistently drive recklessly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please consider introducing  restrictions on young inexperienced drivers who consistently drive recklessly or without "due care and attention".

Consider making it mandatory  for young drivers to display Age Plates  similar to L plates  but displaying the AGE  of the driver.   This would make  it easier for the Police  to target "boy racers"
